    • Are you having challenges finding candidates ready to hit the ground running?

    TalentUp provides a digitalized and objective assessment service combining a unique set of assessment criteria to speed up your hiring processes as well as attract, assess, and train, top talent who can create value for your business from their first day on the job.

    Find A Job

    Research shows..

    60% of Sub-Saharan African employers state that job seekers have not been trained with skills, hard and soft, to be productive in the labor force.
    Undigitized recruitment systems makes it difficult for organizations to vet through, and assess, candidate capabilities.
    55% of Sub-Saharan African employers assert that job seekers do not match their hiring needs.
    Organizations receive too many applications for each position (often over 1,000) where only 10-15 percent of applicants are cited to be qualified.

    Why you need Talentup Africa

    We create an ecosystem among assessment, training, and placement while using a digitalized platform and mobile technology to streamline hiring solutions.

    Customized candidate list based upon our objective assessment criteria

    • CV, background and fit
    • Aptitude
    • Industry / Job relevant skills
    • Personality

    Customized candidate list based upon our objective assessment criteria

    • Aptitude

    • Personality

    Our Offerings

    Digitalized and fast recruitment services
    Objective Selection criteria
    Enhanced candidate experience
    Candidate’s ready to be productive on their first day at work
    Assessments (Industry Specific, Personality, Aptitude/ analytical capabilities)

    How recruitment works

    1

    Identify hiring needs

    Hiring company identify hiring needs.

    2

    Job Description

    The hiring company provides a job description to TalentUp Africa.

    3

    Course and Quiz Identification

    The hiring company selects what courses and quizzes a candidate is recommended to engage based on predetermined criteria to qualify for a position.

    4

    Job Posting

    The position, including its requirements, is posted on TalentUp Africa.

    5

    Selection

    An algorithm is applied using applicants’ background and results on personality, aptitude, and industry knowledge quizzes as selection tool Onboard.

    6

    Shortlisted Candidate

    Provides the hiring company with shortlisted candidates based on their company’s need.
